image

Class ImageOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • image.ImageOps

  • public abstract class ImageOps
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for storing misc operations for image processing. Very handy stuff.
    Author:
    twtduck

      • setPixelToWhite

        public static void setPixelToWhite(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                   int x,
                                   int y)
        Sets a particular pixel to be white. This is used in generating the monochrome image.
        Parameters:
        img - the image in which the pixel should be converted
        x - the x-coordinate of the pixel
        y - the y-coordinate of the pixel

      • setPixelToBlack

        public static void setPixelToBlack(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                   int x,
                                   int y)
        Sets a particular pixel to be black. This is used in generating the monochrome image.
        Parameters:
        img - the image in which the pixel should be converted
        x - the x-coordinate of the pixel
        y - the y-coordinate of the pixel
